definition: root/stem/origin/source/this/the current/original/inherent/originally/classifier for books, periodicals, files etc
name/noun (part of speech)/place (e.g. among winners)/famous/classifier for people

sentences.english: The signature on a negotiable instrument shall be the true name of the party thereto.
sentences.chinese: 在票據上的簽名，應當爲該當事人的本名。

sentences.english: The signature on an instrument must be the name of the party concerned.
sentences.chinese: 在票據上的簽名，應當爲該當事人的本名。

sentences.english: Here’s one explanation for the origins of the names of the current months of the year.
sentences.chinese: 下面是月份的本名的解釋。

sentences.english: Murong Yujun was born in Guangzhou in 1927 with the original name of Li Weike.
sentences.chinese: 慕容羽軍，本名李維克，一九二七年出生於廣州。

sentences.english: Bole whose real name is Yang Sun, he is the person Spring and Autumn Period.
sentences.chinese: 第一個被稱作伯樂的人本名孫陽，他是春秋時代的人。

definition: one's native place/place of ancestry/registered birthplace
pet name for a child/infant name
also known as/alternative name/to also be called
to call oneself/to claim to be/to profess/to claim a title
